# aci_ip_address_pool #

Data source for ACI IP Address Pool

## API Information ##

* Class: [fvnsAddrInst](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvnsAddrInst/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 1.0(1e) and later.

* Distinguished Name Format: `uni/tn-{name}/addrinst-{name}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Tenants (mgmt) -> IP Address Pools`

## Example Usage ##

```hcl

data "aci_ip_address_pool" "example" {
  name = "test_name"
}

```

## Schema ##

### Required ###

* `name` (name) - (string) The name of the IP Address Pool object.

### Read-Only ###

* `id` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the IP Address Pool object.
* `gateway_address` (addr) - (string) The gateway address of the IP Address Pool object.
* `address_type` (addrType) - (string) The gateway address type of the IP Address Pool object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 1.1(1j) and later.
* `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the IP Address Pool object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `description` (descr) - (string) The description of the IP Address Pool object.
* `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the IP Address Pool object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
* `owner_key` (ownerKey) - (string) The key for enabling clients to own their data for entity correlation.
* `owner_tag` (ownerTag) - (string) A tag for enabling clients to add their own data. For example, to indicate who created this object.
* `skip_gateway_validation` (skipGwVal) - (string) Skip gateway validation for the IP Address Pool object.
* `ip_address_blocks` - (list) A list of IP Address Blocks (ACI object [fvnsUcastAddrBlk](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvnsUcastAddrBlk/overview)).
    * `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the IP Address Block object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `description` (descr) - (string) The description of the IP Address Block object.
    * `from` (from) - (string) The first unicast address in the address block.
    * `name` (name) - (string) The name of the IP Address Block object.
    * `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the IP Address Block object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
    * `to` (to) - (string) The last unicast address in the address block.
    * `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
        * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
        * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
    * `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
        * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
        * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
